template.name: Template Module Brocade_Foundry Performance SNMPv2
template.description: Template Module Brocade_Foundry Performance version: 0.15 MIBs used: FOUNDRY-SN-AGENT-MIB

item.name: CPU utilization
item.description: MIB: FOUNDRY-SN-AGENT-MIB The statistics collection of 1 minute CPU utilization.

item.name: Memory utilization
item.description: MIB: FOUNDRY-SN-AGENT-MIB The system dynamic memory utilization, in unit of percentage. Deprecated: Refer to snAgSystemDRAMUtil. For NI platforms, refer to snAgentBrdMemoryUtil100thPercent

template.name: Template Net Brocade_Foundry Nonstackable SNMPv2
template.description: Template Net Brocade_Foundry Nonstackable version: 0.15 Overview: For devices(old Foundry devices, MLXe and so on) that doesn't support Stackable SNMP Tables: snChasFan2Table, snChasPwrSupply2Table,snAgentTemp2Table - FOUNDRY-SN-AGENT-MIB::snChasFanTable, snChasPwrSupplyTable,snAgentTempTable are used instead. For example: The objects in table snChasPwrSupply2Table is not supported on the NetIron and the FastIron SX devices. snChasFan2Table is not supported on on the NetIron devices. snAgentTemp2Table is not supported on old versions of MLXe MIBs used: FOUNDRY-SN-AGENT-MIB

item.name: Firmware version
item.description: MIB: FOUNDRY-SN-AGENT-MIB The version of the running software in the form'major.minor.maintenance[letters]'

discovery_rule.name: PSU Discovery
discovery_rule.description: snChasPwrSupplyTable: A table of each power supply information. Only installed power supply appears in a table row.

trigger_prototype.name: PSU {#PSU_INDEX}: Power supply is in critical state
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Please check the power supply unit for errors

trigger_prototype.name: PSU {#PSU_INDEX}: Power supply is not in normal state
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Please check the power supply unit for errors

dependency.name: PSU {#PSU_INDEX}: Power supply is in critical state

discovery_rule.name: FAN Discovery
discovery_rule.description: snChasFanTable: A table of each fan information. Only installed fan appears in a table row.

trigger_prototype.name: Fan {#FAN_INDEX}: Fan is in critical state
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Please check the fan unit

trigger_prototype.name: Fan {#FAN_INDEX}: Fan is not in normal state
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Please check the fan unit

dependency.name: Fan {#FAN_INDEX}: Fan is in critical state

discovery_rule.name: Temperature Discovery
discovery_rule.description: snAgentTempTable:Table to list temperatures of the modules in the device. This table is applicable to only those modules with temperature sensors.

item_prototype.name: {#SENSOR_DESCR}: Temperature
item_prototype.description: MIB: FOUNDRY-SN-AGENT-MIB Temperature of the sensor represented by this row. Each unit is 0.5 degrees Celsius.

trigger_prototype.name: {#SENSOR_DESCR}: Temperature is above warning threshold: >{$TEMP_WARN:""}
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

trigger_prototype.name: {#SENSOR_DESCR}: Temperature is above critical threshold: >{$TEMP_CRIT:""}
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

discovery_rule.name: Temperature Discovery Chassis
discovery_rule.description: Since temperature of the chassis is not available on all Brocade/Foundry hardware, this LLD is here to avoid unsupported items.

item_prototype.name: Temperature
item_prototype.description: MIB: FOUNDRY-SN-AGENT-MIB Temperature of the chassis. Each unit is 0.5 degrees Celcius. Only management module built with temperature sensor hardware is applicable. For those non-applicable management module, it returns no-such-name.

trigger_prototype.name: Temperature is above warning threshold: >{$TEMP_WARN:""}
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

trigger_prototype.name: Temperature is above critical threshold: >{$TEMP_CRIT:""}
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

template.name: Template Net Brocade_Foundry Stackable SNMPv2
template.description: Template Brocade_Foundry Stackable version: 0.15 Overview: For devices(most of the IronWare Brocade devices) that support Stackable SNMP Tables in FOUNDRY-SN-AGENT-MIB: snChasFan2Table, snChasPwrSupply2Table,snAgentTemp2Table - so objects from all Stack members are provided. MIBs used: FOUNDRY-SN-AGENT-MIB FOUNDRY-SN-STACKING-MIB Known Issues: description : Correct fan(returns fan status as 'other(1)' and temperature (returns 0) for the non-master Switches are not available in SNMP version : Version 08.0.40b and above device : ICX 7750 in stack

item.name: Firmware version
item.description: MIB: FOUNDRY-SN-AGENT-MIB The version of the running software in the form 'major.minor.maintenance[letters]'

discovery_rule.name: PSU Discovery
discovery_rule.description: snChasPwrSupply2Table: A table of each power supply information for each unit. Only installed power supply appears in a table row.

trigger_prototype.name: Unit {#PSU_UNIT} PSU {#PSU_INDEX}: Power supply is in critical state
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Please check the power supply unit for errors

trigger_prototype.name: Unit {#PSU_UNIT} PSU {#PSU_INDEX}: Power supply is not in normal state
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Please check the power supply unit for errors

dependency.name: Unit {#PSU_UNIT} PSU {#PSU_INDEX}: Power supply is in critical state

discovery_rule.name: FAN Discovery
discovery_rule.description: snChasFan2Table: A table of each fan information for each unit. Only installed fan appears in a table row.

trigger_prototype.name: Unit {#FAN_UNIT} Fan {#FAN_INDEX}: Fan is in critical state
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Please check the fan unit

trigger_prototype.name: Unit {#FAN_UNIT} Fan {#FAN_INDEX}: Fan is not in normal state
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Please check the fan unit

dependency.name: Unit {#FAN_UNIT} Fan {#FAN_INDEX}: Fan is in critical state

discovery_rule.name: Temperature Discovery
discovery_rule.description: snAgentTemp2Table:Table to list temperatures of the modules in the device for each unit. This table is applicable to only those modules with temperature sensors.

item_prototype.name: {#SENSOR_DESCR}: Temperature
item_prototype.description: MIB: FOUNDRY-SN-AGENT-MIB Temperature of the sensor represented by this row. Each unit is 0.5 degrees Celsius.

trigger_prototype.name: {#SENSOR_DESCR}: Temperature is above warning threshold: >{$TEMP_WARN:""}
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

trigger_prototype.name: {#SENSOR_DESCR}: Temperature is above critical threshold: >{$TEMP_CRIT:""}
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

item_prototype.name: Unit {#SNMPINDEX}: Hardware model name
item_prototype.description: MIB: FOUNDRY-SN-STACKING-MIB A description of the configured/active system type for each unit.

discovery_rule.name: Chassis Discovery
discovery_rule.description: snChasUnitIndex: The index to chassis table.

item_prototype.name: Unit {#SNMPVALUE}: Hardware serial number
item_prototype.description: MIB: FOUNDRY-SN-AGENT-MIB The serial number of the chassis for each unit. If the serial number is unknown or unavailable then the value should be a zero length string.

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Net Brocade_Foundry Stackable SNMPv2:system.hw.serialnumber[snChasUnitSerNum.{#SNMPINDEX}].diff()}=1 and {Template Net Brocade_Foundry Stackable SNMPv2:system.hw.serialnumber[snChasUnitSerNum.{#SNMPINDEX}].strlen()}>0
trigger_prototype.name: Unit {#SNMPVALUE}: Device has been replaced (new serial number received)
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Device serial number has changed. Ack to close

trigger.expression: {Template Net Brocade_Foundry Nonstackable SNMPv2:system.hw.serialnumber.diff()}=1 and {Template Net Brocade_Foundry Nonstackable SNMPv2:system.hw.serialnumber.strlen()}>0
trigger.name: Device has been replaced (new serial number received)
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Device serial number has changed. Ack to close

trigger.expression: {Template Net Brocade_Foundry Nonstackable SNMPv2:system.hw.firmware.diff()}=1 and {Template Net Brocade_Foundry Nonstackable SNMPv2:system.hw.firmware.strlen()}>0
trigger.name: Firmware has changed
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Firmware version has changed. Ack to close

trigger.expression: {Template Net Brocade_Foundry Stackable SNMPv2:system.hw.firmware.diff()}=1 and {Template Net Brocade_Foundry Stackable SNMPv2:system.hw.firmware.strlen()}>0
trigger.name: Firmware has changed
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Firmware version has changed. Ack to close
